algorithms.RSSalg.GA

Class GAThresholdOptimiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.RSSalg.GA.GAThresholdOptimiser

  • public class GAThresholdOptimiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of genetic algorithm used for threshold optimization of RSSalg and RSSalgbest from the paper (chapter 3.1):

    J. Slivka, A. Kovacevic, Z. Konjovic: "Combining Co-Training with Ensemble Learning for Application on Single-View Natural Language Datasets". Acta Polytechnica Hungarica 10 (2)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Candidate bestSoFar
      Best candidate found so far
      protected ClassifierEnsembleList classifierStatistics
      Statistics (instance ids, predictions and confidences for each prediction) about the instances labeled during the algorithm execution (instances formally belonging to the unlabeled set, labeled and added to train data by the algorithm)
      protected java.util.List<Candidate> currentGeneration
      Current generation of candidates
      protected CoTrainingData data
      Data (labeled, unlabeled and test instances) used in the experiment
      protected CandidateEvaluatorIF evaluator
      Algorithm used for candidate evaluation
      protected int fold
      Current fold in fold-cross validation experiment
      protected java.lang.String logFileLocation
      If a log file for GA should be kept, write it in {results_folder}/fold_{currentFold}/ThresholdOptimiserlog.txt
      protected MeasureIF measure
      Measure used for candidate evaluation
      protected int minExampleOccuranceThreshold
      Minimal example occurrence threshold to explore.
      protected int minLabelAgreementThreshold
      Minimal label agreement threshold to explore.
      protected java.util.List<Candidate> nextGeneration
      The next generation of candidates
      protected static int noBits
      Number of bits that encode the candidates chromosome
      private int noImproval
      Number of generations in which there was no improval of the result
      protected java.util.Random rand
      Random number generator cloned from DataSettings
      private double totalFitnessSum
      Sum of candidates fitnesses

    • Field Detail

      • data

        protected CoTrainingData data
        Data (labeled, unlabeled and test instances) used in the experiment

      • classifierStatistics

        protected ClassifierEnsembleList classifierStatistics
        Statistics (instance ids, predictions and confidences for each prediction) about the instances labeled during the algorithm execution (instances formally belonging to the unlabeled set, labeled and added to train data by the algorithm)

      • rand

        protected java.util.Random rand
        Random number generator cloned from DataSettings

      • evaluator

        protected CandidateEvaluatorIF evaluator
        Algorithm used for candidate evaluation

      • measure

        protected MeasureIF measure
        Measure used for candidate evaluation

      • currentGeneration

        protected java.util.List<Candidate> currentGeneration
        Current generation of candidates

      • nextGeneration

        protected java.util.List<Candidate> nextGeneration
        The next generation of candidates

      • minLabelAgreementThreshold

        protected int minLabelAgreementThreshold
        Minimal label agreement threshold to explore. E.g. if the minimal label agreement in the obtained statistics is 70%, there is no need to explore candidates that have lower label threshold than 70%

      • minExampleOccuranceThreshold

        protected int minExampleOccuranceThreshold
        Minimal example occurrence threshold to explore. E.g. if the minimal example occurence in the obtained statistics is 30%, there is no need to explore candidates that have lower label threshold than 30%

      • noBits

        protected static int noBits
        Number of bits that encode the candidates chromosome

      • totalFitnessSum

        private double totalFitnessSum
        Sum of candidates fitnesses

      • bestSoFar

        protected Candidate bestSoFar
        Best candidate found so far

      • fold

        protected int fold
        Current fold in fold-cross validation experiment

      • logFileLocation

        protected java.lang.String logFileLocation
        If a log file for GA should be kept, write it in {results_folder}/fold_{currentFold}/ThresholdOptimiserlog.txt

      • noImproval

        private int noImproval
        Number of generations in which there was no improval of the result

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAThresholdOptimiser

        public GAThresholdOptimiser(ClassifierEnsembleList classifierStatistics,
                            CoTrainingData data,
                            int fold)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the new instance of GAThresholdOptimiser
        Parameters:
        classifierStatistics - Statistics (instance ids, predictions and confidences for each prediction) about the instances labeled during the algorithm execution
        data - Data (labeled, unlabeled and test instances) used in the experiment. Makes a deep copy of the data, so the original object is not modified
        fold - Current fold in fold-cross validation experiment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there was an error during merging of the views (the final classifier in RSSalg uses a unique attribute set)

        Parameters:
        oldMin - old minimum
        oldMax - old maximum
        newMin - new minimum
        newMax - new maximum
        oldValue - value to scale in the new range
        Returns:
        the value scaled in the new range

      • scaleToLabelAgreementRange

        private double scaleToLabelAgreementRange(double labelAgreement)
        Scale label agreement from the range [0, 100]% to range [minLabelAgreementThreshold, 100] %
        Parameters:
        labelAgreement - label agreement value
        Returns:
        label agreement scaled to the new range [minLabelAgreementThreshold, 100] %

      • scaleToExampleOccurenceRange

        private double scaleToExampleOccurenceRange(double exampleOccurence)
        Scale example occurrence from the range [0, 100]% to range [minExampleOccuranceThreshold, 100] %
        Parameters:
        exampleOccurence - example occurrence value
        Returns:
        label example occurrence scaled to the new range [minExampleOccuranceThreshold, 100] %

      • int2bin

        private int[] int2bin(double val,
                      int min)
        A convenience method for converting an int value to binary code
        Parameters:
        val - int value for conversion
        min - minimal possible value for the int (min where val belongs to range [min, 100], see chapter 3.1 from the paper)
        Returns:
        binary code for int value

      • bin2int

        private int bin2int(int[] bin,
                    int min)
        A convenience method for converting the binary code to an int value
        Parameters:
        bin - binary code for conversion
        min - minimal possible value for the int (min where val belongs to range [min, 100], see chapter 3.1 from the paper)
        Returns:
        corresponding int value

      • rouletteSelection

        private Candidate rouletteSelection()
        Select the candidate by performing roulette wheel [Back 1991] selection - the probability of selecting the candidate for reproduction is proportional to its fitness

        Back and F. Hoffmeister. Extended Selection Mechanisms in Genetic Algorithm. In: Belew, R. K. and Brooker, L. B., editors, Proc. 4th International Conference on Genetic Algorithm, pp. 92-99, 1991.

        Returns:
        the selected candidate

      • crossover

        private void crossover(Candidate candidate1,
                       Candidate candidate2)
        Perform the bi-parental uniform crossover [Syswerda 1989] between the pair of candidates

        Syswerda. Uniform crossover in genetic algorithms. Proceedings of the 3rd International Conference on Genetic Algorithms, pp. 2-9, 1989.

        Parameters:
        candidate1 - the 1st candidate
        candidate2 - the 2nd candidate

      • mutation

        private void mutation(Candidate candidate)
        Perform the single-point mutation [Goldberg 1989]

        D. Goldberg. Genetic algorithms in search, optimization and machine learning. Addison–Wesley, 1989.

        Parameters:
        candidate - candidate to perform the mutation on

      • generateNextGeneration

        protected void generateNextGeneration()
        Generate the next generation from the current one

      • shouldStop

        private boolean shouldStop(int currentIteration)
        Whether or not the GA should stop in this iteration (max number of generations reached or there was no improvement in last x generations)
        Parameters:
        currentIteration - the current iteration of GA
        Returns:
        true if the stopping criteria has been reached, false otherwise

      • run

        public Candidate run()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Run the genetic algorithm for threshold pair optimization in RSSalg
        Returns:
        the best candidate (found optimum)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there was an error during evaluation of the threshold pair candidates

      • logGeneration

        private void logGeneration(int generationNo)
        Used for GA logging
        Parameters:
        generationNo - number of generation that is logged
